price: Afei Yebeyi wͻn a wͻsuroo Nyame no afri mu, na Yagya abͻneεfoͻ no wͻ mu (wͻ wͻn) nkotodwe so.
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
